metaTitle: Transform Your Life And Achieve Your Goals

topSection.title: Transform Your Life And Achieve Your Goals
topSection.description: Please take a quick 3-minute quiz. It will help us understand your patterns and triggers to shape your personal development plan.

list.title: Bonus program
list.text: Our rewards program is a class act for our customers. For every purchase, you get a capybara and you get bonuses, for which you can buy something else!

list.title: Awesome sticker pack as a gift
list.text: We give an awesome branded capybaras sticker pack when you place your first order so that you have fond memories of us!

reviews.title: Reviews
reviews.description: Our customers love our products and are willing to share feedback about them. Thank you for every review!
